sentence.Network_en: Polymorphism in elements is called allotropy.
sentence.Network_cn: 把元素中的多晶现象称为同素异构性.

sentence.Network_en: A structurally differentiated form of an element that exhibits allotropy.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek allotropos 'of another form', from allo- 'other' + tropos 'manner' (from trepein 'to turn')

means.word_mean: 1. the phenomenon of an element existing in two or more physical forms
